sentences.en: A wood nymph who was changed into a fountain by Artemis.
sentences.cn: 阿瑞托莎被阿耳忒弥斯变成喷泉的山林中的仙女.

sentences.en: Achilles was a great Greek warrior and son of the sea nymph Thetis.
sentences.cn: 阿基里斯为一名伟大的希腊战士,是海仙女特蒂斯之子.

sentences.en: But the nymph Echo kept near him.
sentences.cn: 但森林女神爱蔻跟在他附近.

sentences.en: Description of nymph of Amblygamasus atushiensis ( Acri: Gamasina: Parasitidae )
sentences.cn: 阿图什钝革螨若螨描述 ( 蜱螨亚纲: 革螨股: 寄螨科 )

sentences.en: Objective To construct a cDNA expression library of Periplaneta Americana nymph.
sentences.cn: 目的　构建美洲大蠊若虫cDNA表达文库.

sentences.en: The Bath of the Nymph over the bed.
sentences.cn: 床上端悬挂着一幅《宁芙沐浴图》.

sentences.en: The life cycle of mayflies consists of four stages: egg, nymph, subimago, and imago.
sentences.cn: 蜉蝣的生命周期由四个阶段组成: 卵, 蛹,亚成虫, 成虫.

words.tran_cn: 女神；居于山林水泽的仙女；美丽的少女；蛹

trans.tran_en: one of the spirits of nature who, according to ancient Greek and Roman stories, appeared as young girls living in trees, mountains, streams etc
